sentences: Ma tänan sind tol vastu võtmise eest.
Tol aitab meil mõista olukorda täpsemalt.
Sul on suurepärane tol suhtes minu rahu hoidmiseks.
context: The Estonian word 'tol' refers to expressing thanks or appreciation for something received, similar to the English word 'thank you.' It is commonly used in social interactions to show politeness and acknowledge others' actions or gifts.
